intro: WDND 101.7 FM is our high school's very own radio station. We're a low power FM (LPFM) station licensed by the FCC, giving students hands-on experience in broadcasting, journalism, and media production.

features.title: Low Power FM
features.description: Broadcasting at 101.7 FM, WDND is an FCC-licensed low power FM station serving our school and surrounding community.

features.title: Community Voice
features.description: WDND gives students a platform to be heard and connects our school with the local community.
